nodeMetric.field_description: Reach is the measure of how many people were exposed to your content during a given campaign.

body.summary: Reach is the measure of how many people were exposed to your content during a given campaign.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Page Impressions is the total number of times your pages are shown.
Page Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your pages or posts at least once.
Ad Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your ads at least once. Reach can help you understand how many people have been exposed to a specific advertisement or marketing message.
